text: The UEFA European Under-21 Championship is a football competition that happens every two years. It is played by the European men's under-21 national teams of the member associations of UEFA. Italy and Spain have won the trophy more times than anyone else. They have won five times each. Spain are also the current champions. ==Results== ===Under-23 championships=== Held only three times before it was relabelled by UEFA.
